entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Track investigating System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.NJulianRuleTest failure on Android #73031
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Assert when compiling System.Runtime.Tests #73027
  • [API Proposal]: Alloc-free hex conversion #73026
  • Resolve StaticCS.0.1.0 source-build prebuilt #73025
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterTests.PerformanceCounter_IncrementBy_IncrementBy2 failed on release/6.0 #73019
  • Bug when using XML configuration via ConfigurationBuilder. #73016
  • SingleFile usage of EventLog may not be able to access resource dll #73012
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Configure the Diagnostic Server using DOTNET_DiagnosticPorts #73011
    7.0.0
  • [iOS] Marshal.StructureToPtr fails in System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnitTests #73008
    7.0.0
  • .NET 7 exception on Android with EnableLLVM=true #73003
    7.0.0
  • Dispatcher.Invoke() slows down Parallel.For performances on .NET 6 #73001
  • [API Proposal]: Add a BitArray.Contains method #72999
    8.0.0
  • [LinuxBionic][CI] `System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.NJulianRuleTest` failing #72995
  • Interop+Crypto+OpenSslCryptographicException instead of CryptographicException (AsnContentException) #72994
    Future
  • [wasm] drop cjs follow-up #72990
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Runtime Directives (rd.xml) file not applied? #72989
  • [WINARM][Regression] Fail to run the command – dotnet test --framework net7.0 --arch x64/x86 --diag:log.txt #72988
  • System.IO.Ports tests don't copy their native dependency #72987
  • JIT: Recognize 'bt' bit test idiom #72986
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Additional QuicConnectionOptions #72984
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_Cancellation_Test_NonParallel.CancelPendingRequest_DropsStalledConnectionAttempt(versionString: \"2.0\", firstConnectionDelayMs: 10000, requestTimeoutMs: 1000, pendingConnectionTimeoutOnRequestCompletion: 100) #72977
  • [JIT] - Consolidate logic for `NextCallReturnAddress` to the beginning of `impIntrinsic` #72972
    8.0.0

Closed

  • ParallelOptions.MaxDegreeOfParallelism documentation, is the given advice correct? #72981
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Concurrent.Count<String> #72197
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect behaviour of String.StartsWith(String) #72992
  • System.Text.Json Serialize ignores Properties from base interfaces #73021
  • [wasm][aot] build tries to cross compile unrelated dlls from the publish folder #46856
    7.0.0
  • Backport #61798 to .NET 6 #73007
  • [wasm][debugger] Assertion caused by invalid array id being used #65742
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'preciseVarTypeMap[type] != TYP_UNDEF' when dumping all functions #69551
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed: get_region_gen_num (region) == 0 #70262
    7.0.0
  • Developers can confidently generate single file apps that work for the supported target platforms #43540
    7.0.0
  • HelloiOS failing on CI with exit code 1 #57666
    7.0.0
  • Proxy credentials issue in SocketsHttpHandler #65138
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add remaining APIs to complete NativeMemory set #69606
    Future
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlClient is not compatible with AssemblyLoadContext unloading #31377
    7.0.0
  • solved | System.BadImageFormatException with C++/CLI DLLs #53491
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'retVal->OperIs(GT_LCL_VAR)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #72926
    7.0.0
  • coreclr build-test.cmd can quietly fail to update files #2148
    7.0.0
  • Post-6.0 infrastructure improvements #59271
    7.0.0
  • Http/3 adds alt-used header even when alt-svc isn't is used #56876
    7.0.0
  • [6.0] HelloWorld singlefile app does not run on arm64 macos on SDK 6.0.203 or newer #69923
    7.0.0
  • AppModel docs and cleanup for 6.0 #57682
    6.0.x
  • `ldelem[a]` importation treats pointers as `object`s #71636
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Switch the WBT tests from v8 to browser on Windows #72918
    7.0.0
  • Threads accumulating in Suspended state and issue with CLR Critical Section #72971
    Future
  • HTTP/2: Possible race when receiving HEADERS and RST_STREAM together #68373
    7.0.0
  • string.LastIndexOf for empty string result change between Core 3.1 and .Net 5/6 #73002
  • System.Diagnostics.Debug.Tests fail on iOS #36882
    7.0.0
  • [jitstress-isas-x86] Assertion failed 'compiler->compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(isa)' during 'Generate code' #71928
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tracing.Tests Fails on Android #50926
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix member type in static structures #68539
    7.0.0
  • SslStress fails to build on Linux #72399
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Cannot use array indexing expressions with VS immediate window #56021
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][wbt] Wasm.Build.Tests.WasmBuildAppTest.TopLevelMain failed #72880
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient 4.3.2 broken on Mono #21777
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Expose response status code in WebSocketException for WebSocketError.NotAWebSocket case #72976
  • [wasm] Drop support for CommonJS and WasmEnableES6 #63337
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Non-cooperative abortion of code execution #69622
    7.0.0
  • Reconcile naming: RegexGeneratorAttribute to RegexAttribute #62123
    7.0.0
  • HardwareIntrinsics RunReflectionScenario_Load failing due to "Assertion failed 'tgtIG'" #71950
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses #73032
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Disable NJulianRuleTest on Android #73030
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Add documentation for hot/cold splitting #73029
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1910260 #73028
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [android][debugger] Fix infinite recursion and null pointer access while debugging #73024
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add the ability to load a PKCS10 into CertificateRequest #73023
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Respect the Keep-Alive response header on HTTP/1.0 #73020
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [eventpipe] Use MonoImage:name when available, if MonoImage:filename is null #73018
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] JIT: Avoid removing multi-use boxes #73014
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] AOT ptr-to-structure and structure-to-ptr wrappers for no… #73013
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mono][interp] Fix short branches #73010
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 6.0.9
  • Do not check object references for equality after hot reload #73009
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix crc32 issues found in #62692 #73005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] CreateSymbolicLink PInvoke retval must be marshalled as U1 #73004
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.9
  • [wasm][debugger] Create a method to compare previous frames on call stack for firefox #73000
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Implementation of opcode OP_GC_SAFE_POINT for ppc64le #72997
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] `JSImport` generator `AllowUnsafeBlocks` diagnostic #72996
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Move format.py script and use retrying download #72993
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: one-sided inference from unrelated predicates #72979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix delegate invokes returning byref types. #72978
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Descriptor parser support #72975
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove ActiveIssue tag in ThreadPoolBoundHandle_IntegrationTests.netcoreapp.cs #72973
    area-System.Threading

Merged

  • Remove some debug code #72985
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add support for specifying Kerberos package on Linux/macOS #72024
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] reduce legacy interop usage #72021
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix assert when passing an invalid array to runtime. #73006
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Do not embed result type in VN for scalar hw intrinsics #72895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid promoting in sweep_in_plan when we already decided not to promote #72998
    area-GC-coreclr
  • #53624 enable test suites in maccatalyst #72445
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix SslStress docker build #72940
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update the CustomMarshallerAttributeFixer to support adding missing methods for stateless marshaller shapes #72869
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Added remaining APIs to complete NativeMemory set #72960
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use the common path for lowering single-reg SIMD returns #72944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Annoating Net.Quic & Net.Security libraries to be AOT safe #72791
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • HTTP/3 Made alt-used show only on alt-svc redirect #72669
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix `ldelem[a]/stelem/cpobj/ldobj/stobj <pointer type>` import #71679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: Use Chrome on windows, instead of V8 #72983
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][jit] Use MONO_CLASS_IS_SIMD () in more places to fix running w… #72982
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix race when receiving HEADERS and RST_STREAM in rapid succession. #72932
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [WIP][Mono] Enable tests disabled by issue 36882. #72931
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Skip Min/Max optimization when SSE2 is not enabled #72991
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [libs][mono] Enable diagnostics_tracing runtime component in Android build #72955
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluate expression of mutidimensional array. #72964
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1908946 #72980
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Remove support for CommonJS #72865
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Implement ControlledExecution API #71661
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add extra Module.ModuleHandle test #72875
  • Minor cleanup in MethodDesc::GetPrecompiledCode #72963
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Bump timeout on ARM64 NativeAOT legs #72974
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][wbt] Test that `dotnet.js` could be run from any current directory #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Add memory fences to ByRefAssignRef on Unix ARM64 #72919
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable tests that wait for compaction #72954
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • Rename [RegexGenerator] to [GeneratedRegex] #72434
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fixed HWIntrinsic reflection bug with `NextCallReturnAddress` intrinsic #72505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm][debugger] Fix "command is not pending" #72953
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing the per object hard limit support for regions #72229
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Kerberos loopback test #71824
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Hash the AssertionDsc struct for faster lookup #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allocate string literals on POH #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • 30% optimization of `DateTime.GetDate()`/`.GetDatePart()` by 'Euclidean affine functions' #72712
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • fix: [Wasm] Adjust windows build #70689
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Trying to add support for building WBT with multiple runtime packs #72815
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Unix] Console.ReadKey rewrite #72193
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Make IHostEnvironment.ApplicationName non-nullable #72945
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Add stateful marshaller support to the CustomMarshallerAttributeAnalyzer #72888
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add EH filters for generic catch(T) blocks #72721
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm-ep] diagnostic server IPC fixups #72859
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono
  • Add innerException to ResourceReader when it doesn't support serialization #72957
    area-System.Resources
  • Make JSON support required properties #72937
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Contain memory operands under casts #72719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • [Android] Introduce NetTraceToMibcConverter task & streamline testing targets #72394
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix UnsupportedOSPlatformAttribute usage in System.Net.NetworkInformation.cs #72792
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][interp] Improve tiering performance #70649
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Annotate System.Linq.Queryable with RDC #72899
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][draft] re-try downloading assets #72933
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Support zero-byte reads on raw response streams in SocketsHttpHandler #72804
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Refactor root-level serialization logic and polymorphic value handling. #72789
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [6.0] Re-create MultiCoreJIT profile data on profile-use-only mode #71754
    Servicing-approved, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.9
  • [release/6.0] [mono][jit] Fix an infinite loop in the abcrem pass. #72504
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.9
  • Use correct runtime assembly in MetadataReader tests #72211
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, test-bug, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Include EventLog.Messages in WindowsDesktop pack #72809
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.9
  • Add more DataFlow tests from linker to NativeAOT #72777
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Workload runtimepack 6 #72147
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0][mono] add 400 band workloads #72379
  • Add Span.Reverse() intrinsic for Arm64 #72780
    community-contribution
  • Set IsDynamicCodeCompiled as a managed constant to help #72762
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RateLimiting] Add statistics API #72306
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable MsQuicTests.ConnectWithClientCertificate on Windows #70015
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • Update Arcade + Workloads #72947
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Delete `(unsigned)CHECK_SPILL_ALL|NONE` casts #72889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added method overload for `IServiceCollection.Configure<T>(Action<T, IServiceProvider>)` #72942
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not reference `System.Text.Encoding.CodePages` on frameworks where it is inbox. #72784
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixed a WKS specific issue by not clobbering the heap_segment_saved_allocated #72923
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Check on tests we disabled on Linux #72832
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Get more libraries tests running with NativeAOT #72917
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Ensure prerequisites are installed on the perf pipeline #72431
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Tar: restore directory permissions while extracting. #72078
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics
  • Socket: cancel on-going operations when Sockets with non-owning handle gets disposed. #72000
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Support splitting on ARM64 #1946

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] RhpByRefAssignRef is missing a barrier for Linux ARM32 and ARM64 #639

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes to R2RDump to dump respective hot/cold parts together #1945

Merged

  • Convert Scratch lookup to binary search #1943
  • Fix GetUnwindInfoHelper so that we will not get a chained unwind info #1942
  • Move inline switch table check to fginline.cpp #1944

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DllImport Issue on Maca64 #26861
  • Consider exposing the ValidateAssemblies targets in the sdk and provide user defaults #26860
    8.0.1xx

Closed

  • Implement the MSBuild Server Client Library as the default build driver #25365
    7.0.1xx
  • [NativeAot] Fix GivenThatWeWantToPublishAnAotApp so as to set the PublishAot property via AdditionalProperties #26791
  • dotnet publish -graph fails while dotnet build -graph works #24414
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update minimum msbuild for RC1 #26872
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [25961] - dotnet watch first key press fix #26870
    area-System.Console
  • Avoid parallel workload MSI extraction #26862
  • Remove custom logic of fetching dotnet dir #26851
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [DRAFT] Get PublishRelease working in .csproj #26808
    Area-Infrastructure
  • ApiCompat: Add ValidateAssemblies msbuild task and add global tool #26616
    Area-Compatibility
  • Fix package installer tests #26843
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Stop double copying all of the watch and format files. #26811
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet/templating#3829 evaluating project context for dotnet new execution #26523
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26796

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Can't use C# 8.0 using declaration with a discard #2235
    Backlog
  • Add a way to inherit documentation <inheritdoc /> #313
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Integration tests] Unskip integration tests skipped due to bug with async save of solution files #63026
  • IDE0047 is reported even though option is set to 'always_for_clarity' #63024
  • Figure out interaction between design-time and compile-time source generated files in debugging context #63022
    Backlog
  • Auto-default structs cause runtime exceptions in explicit constructors when a ref field is not initialized #63018
  • Low level struct improvements allow saving managed pointers to structr constructors stack #63016
    17.4
  • Incorrect formatting behaviour when using SyntaxFactory.Block #63013
    Backlog
  • Method Symbol So hard to get arguments #63003
    17.4

Closed

  • TrivialTemporaryStorageService: _stream disposed by caller of ReadStream (crashes in monodevelop) #22085
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32727.216 #63034
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build $((Release.Artifacts._DD-CB-TestSignVS.BuildNumber) #63032
  • Stack overflow in lookup #62795
    17.4
  • Wrong circular base type dependency errors on nested type inheritance #58424
    17.4
  • Convert to interpolated string escapes {} or is disabled #62988
  • Mono.Android.dll IL Size increase in .NET 7 Preview 7 & RC 1 #62832
    17.4
  • VS 17.3 Preview 3 Regression from Preview 2 with ref-returning an out parameter #62900
    17.4
  • VS 17.3 Preview 3 Regression from Preview 2 with ref structs #62940
    17.4
  • Report error for type named `scoped` with language version 11 or later #62931
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove a bunch of duplication in our telemetry logging #63033
    Area-IDE
  • Fix request snapshot bug for languages without an LSP server implementation #63031
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63029
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to a simpler form of checksum->solution caching in the remote workspace layer. (2) #63028
    Area-IDE
  • Skip failing integration tests #63027
    Area-Infrastructure, Infraswat
  • Deregister workspaces from LSP when they are disposed of #63025
    Area-IDE
  • Rename parameter for clarity #63023
    Area-IDE
  • Completion for .editorconfig files #63019
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add back support for incremental background analysis for method body editing scenarios #63017
    Area-Analyzers
  • Don't complete parenthesis after 'new' if the type has nested types #63015
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add progress bar to document outline window #63011
    Area-IDE
  • Record C# 11 status #63010
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Check the right matches in lambdas #63006
    Area-Interactive

Merged

  • Rename `LifetimeAnnotationAttribute` to `ScopedRefAttribute` and simplify #63009
    Area-Compilers, 17.4 P1
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63030
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #62993
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62927
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve circularity analysis in bases for some scenarios. #62799
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update VS Telemetry package #62996
    Area-IDE
  • All text editor options are roaming #62753
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63021
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63020
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • First steps of the hovering feature and simple test case #62569
    Community
  • Obsolete TextAndVersion.FilePath #62989
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63012
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63007
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #63008
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Disallow types named 'scoped' #62968
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #63005
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63004
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63001
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #62962
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #63037
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support UnscopedRefAttribute #62783
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Structural Error Cases for Lambda Default Parameters #62958
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Convert to record #62999
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add correctness check that only runs analyzers #62035
    Area-IDE
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Fix SuppressMessage not working on lambdas #62970

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Way to omit discriminant with multiple classes(with identical properties) sharing a table #28538
  • Call interface implementation from virtual methods in base class when possible #28537
  • Expose connection string in ConnectionCreating event data #28535
    7.0.0
  • How to dispose pooled `DbContext` correctly when using the `PooledDbContextFactory` approach to pass state #28533
  • Cascade delete behavior for FK between PKs in TPT #28532
  • CurrentValues.SetValues() not working for nested objects #28531
  • ChangeTracker keeps EntityEntry after Remove() and SaveContext() #28530

Closed

  • Add a warning when store-generated PK is not supported #11162
    7.0.0
  • Can I define sorting for collections of owned entities? #28481
  • Support sequence key generation on SQL Server, which is useful for Table-per-concrete-type (TPC) mappings #28096
    7.0.0
  • Add a static flag in EF that will be set when code is being executed for design-time discovery #27306
    7.0.0
  • Interception to modify the LINQ expression tree #28505
    7.0.0-preview7
  • Do some reasonable connection cleanup when returning a context with a DbConnection to the pool #27308
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix race condition testing global state #28536
  • Warn for composite generated keys on SQLite #28534
  • Change value generation defaults for numeric keys when using TPC #28529
    providers-beware
  • Add a static flag in EF that will be set when code is being executed for design-time discovery #28508
  • Close the DbConnection when returning a context with a DbConnection to the pool #28519

Updated

  • Implement BulkDelete #28492
  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
